name: TrueSight Pulse Meter HTTP Plugin
description: Measures the page load time of a given URL

paramSchema.title: URL
paramSchema.name: url
paramSchema.description: Url to measure the time to load the page

paramSchema.title: Interval (ms)
paramSchema.name: interval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to measure the time to load a the url.

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the measurement data.
